@graph.name: Vegan Lemon Blueberry Cake. Yogurt Pound Cake Loaf
@graph.description: Vegan Lemon Blueberry Cake. This zesty Blueberry Lemon Pound Cake is dense and full of flavor. Use other berries in this Vegan Pound Cake Recipe. Non Dairy Yogurt Pound Cake Loaf with lemon and blueberries. 15 min prep and done. Makes one 8.5by 4.5 loaf pan.

video.name: Vegan Lemon Blueberry Pound Cake | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Lemon Blueberry Cake Recipe. 
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2016/05/lemon-blueberry-cake-yogurt-pound-cake-loaf.html

This zesty Blueberry Lemon Pound Cake is dense and full of flavor. Use other seasonal berries in this Pound Cake. Add some icing for presentation.  

Non-dairy Yogurt adds a moist and dense texture. The cake takes just 15 Minutes to come together. Mix in all the wet ingredients along with the zest. Whisk all the dry. Mix both into a batter. fold in the blueberries that have been tossed in a bit of flour. Also add some blueberries on top. Bake, cool, slice and done. As with all flavorful loafs and cakes, the flavors get stronger with time. Try this Yogurt Pound Cake Loaf with lemon and blueberries and let me know how it turned out!

More Dessert Recipes: https://www.veganricha.com/category/dessert

For Gluten-free Cakes and Loafs see: https://www.veganricha.com/category/gluten-free/gluten-free-baking

BUY MY COOKBOOK: http://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen 


SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1
#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking

recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup non dairy yogurt (or use blended silken tofu or thick cashew cream or softened vegan cream cheese or vegan sour cream)
3/4 cup or more unrefined sugar (preferably powdered)
Zest of a lemon or lime
2 cups flour (I use 1 cup wheat or spelt flour, and 1 cup unbleached white)
3/4 cup blueberries tossed in 1 tbsp flour

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F / 180ºc. Line a loaf pan with parchment.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F / 180ºc. Line a loaf pan with parchment.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the wet ingredients in a bowl and whisk until the sugar is well combined. 1-2 mins
recipeInstructions.name: Add all the wet ingredients in a bowl and whisk until the sugar is well combined. 1-2 mins

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, whisk all the dry ingredients except blueberries. Add dry to wet and mix until just combined. Reserve 1-2 tbsp blueberries. Fold in the rest of the blueberries into the batter..
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, whisk all the dry ingredients except blueberries. Add dry to wet and mix until just combined. Reserve 1-2 tbsp blueberries. Fold in the rest of the blueberries into the batter..

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the batter into prepared pan. Distribute the remaining blueberries on top and press in lightly.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the batter into prepared pan. Distribute the remaining blueberries on top and press in lightly.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 55 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 55 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan. Cool completely before slicing. Frost or ice if needed. A simple glaze of lemon zest + lemon juice + sugar icing works really well.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan. Cool completely before slicing. Frost or ice if needed. A simple glaze of lemon zest + lemon juice + sugar icing works really well.
